events.message: Add gitian PGP key for hebasto

events.body:
utACK a6cd50d

@hebasto has been regularly contributing sigs since [August 2018](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gitian.sigs/commits?author=hebasto).

Concept ACK. Should have been done after sigs were contributed for two consecutive major releases.
(Didn't check if the key that has this fingerprint also signed those gitian results)

utACK a6cd50dec66933a6794093012e2d0f480fc02ac3

> @hebasto has been regularly contributing sigs since August 2018.

i've also invited him to the bitcoin and bitcoin-core organizations
